website_summaries.verdict: This easy-to-steer sea scooter can go a little deeper and faster than other models, but it also has a shorter run time.
pros: Rated for 131 feet deep with speed of up to 3.34 miles per hour
Up to 30 minutes run time with normal usage
Propellers feature protective net to prevent injuries

customer_reviews.title: Must have “fun”
customer_reviews.text: I’m paralyzed below my waist. Drags me out to where I want to snorkel. My “must have”
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Maddocks

customer_reviews.title: Product suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this scooter looks, I have not used it yet, I did find having to take extra care not to scratch it, this is one thing I wish sublue could offer for the sharkmix, a protective cover, perhaps made from black neoprene, I would be happy to pre-order such a cover, I have made some protection myself but would like a professional cover. Keeping my items in like new condition always makes it easier if you’re ready to upgrade. Great construction, will try it tomorrow and write a follow up. (Sublue, please write a response and let us know if a cover is something we could look forward to. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: mauricio perez-cross

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction 👍
customer_reviews.text: The water scooter was used literally 15 minutes and the right side started not working and then it smelled like it was burning. After several emails with a third party through amazon they replaced it and sent a beautiful back pack with it. Going to give it a five star for customer service and my grandson thinks it’s the best gift ever
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter has been the best addition to the pool. With quarantine going on, this is another bit of variety to have around. It's fast and lightweight. I took off one star because we had early issues with battery leakage. The company was BEYONG GREAT with customer service, and replaced it immediately. The new battery works great, but I wish it lasted longer as we are always fighting over this awesome little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Small but fast
customer_reviews.text: Greats scooter,this is a second one broughtfor grandkids.Last about an hour which is plenty,get a second battery. Built well,a little pricey but worth it,small weighs about 5 lbs
customer_reviews.author: dennis chicoine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun, Even in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: For as small as this thing is, it has very good pulling power, enough to pull a full-grown adult around the pool, including pulling down under the water. It is very easy to use, the charging is simple and the controls are very intuitive. It is a bit on the spendy side, but once you try it, you will understand. Certainly made the summer swim season a ton more enjoyable. I would recommend picking up an extra battery because one will last @ 45 min. and if you have more than one user, it will ensure everyone gets a turn.
customer_reviews.author: GTOGreg

customer_reviews.title: No comparison.
customer_reviews.text: Wow does this thing move. Have had others and this one is in a whole different class . I’ll put it this way you can drive a sedan or sports car. This is definitely the sports car . “Just to compare apples to apples”
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the family and friends.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product after trying it at a friends house over the summer in their pool. My family and a couple of my kids friends that came over enjoyed playing with it in the pool. IT was kind of a pandemic sort of purchase. Since we have been home all summer, this brought us some joy. The only negative comment I have is the opening the battery compartment is a bit tough and getting the battery out is can be a challenge, but overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Lake fun for our grandkids
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our grandkids to play with during our recent Lake Powell AZ houseboat outing. They loved it!! The battery only lasts about 20min, however. Thus you need a back up. Also the battery cover fell off during use, which means it is at the bottom of the lake. The scooter still runs without that cover, however.
customer_reviews.author: SteveR

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you go swimming much or on vacation getaways.. pictures might not look as good of a quality as it does in person .. A++
customer_reviews.author: Samy

customer_reviews.title: To expensive for what our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: We tried in a pool so far. It was ok but no very powerful..also, the battery doesn't last more than 20 minutes. We are having a family trip to the ocean, we will try at the shore soon, and see how it performs in open sea. Thank you Ale
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE KIDS IN THE POOL
customer_reviews.text: This underwater scooter is fantastic. If you have a saltwater pool, please rise thoroughly The plades will freeze up until you soak it in how water..
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: This little thing really moves!
customer_reviews.text: Our two grandkids, 12 & 7 and husband all love the device. It scoots them each around the pool quickly and easily. We have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power for the size
customer_reviews.text: I am not so sure the manufacturer designed the shuttle for this purpose but it is fun to hold it in reverse on your waist while laying on your back and it will surf you over the water on your back. Very cool! Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome scooter! My wife and I bought the MIX PRO and have been using it in Hawaii for the last two weeks. Product is as advertised if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great water craft!
customer_reviews.text: Well made device and shipping was fast. Will Purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: dont buy from sublue direct. they are the WORST company EVER. product works as expected. IF I GETS NEAR ONE GRAIN OF SALT, take it apart and clean EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: White Shark work great but then we had a tech issue. Calle Andrew @ Sublue and he took care of us promptly and solved the issue. Now unit is working great again...
customer_reviews.author: Michael  R. Jeppson

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: I would like the company to replace the strap which fell off in 80 feet of water because of a poor design. The Velcro did not hold.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ba

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra batteries
customer_reviews.text: Everybody loves it by extra batteries doesn’t last that long
customer_reviews.author: Todd Greco

customer_reviews.title: Water fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great kids love it Wish it had a longer battery life
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but the battery compartment is filled with water
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy and I really enjoy it but the battery compartment is filled with water (where has a big sign said do not let the water in). In a long run I think the device will stop working therefore I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tram Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 1 summer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone except for the fact that it stopped working less than 1 summer after use. Would love if there was a warranty. Fans are no longer receiving power from fully charged battery. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: A Big Admirer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old for his birthday. He used it 5 times before the left motor started cutting out when it was fully submerged. Extremely disappointed, I bought it two months before his birthday to be able to pay for it so Amazon won’t accept a return/replacements. I’m going to reach out to Divers Direct to see if they will offer a suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Being cut off after 5 mins of use when I am 10 feet under the sea......😢😢
customer_reviews.text: I love my white shark sea scooter, but after 2months, while I am 10 feet under water the battery cuts off and leaves me breathless under the bottom of the sea, so I have to resurface and wait 10 seconds and then dive again. I bought an extra battery so I would have an extra 30 minutes, but every 5 minutes the batteries cut off, which can be dangerous if I am more then 15 feet under water. I am contacting customer service today to see what can be done and would leave another review after that. Hope this review has been helpful and hope to have the issued fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Palma marques

customer_reviews.title: Uded 3 times and does not work anymore
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought this product in May 2019. I used it once in the pool to test it and it was great. Then I used it once on sea. The 3rd time I used it didn't work anymore. Since had passed more than a year I can not have my refund. I don't know what to do. It does not works and has no technical assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and great help for free diving
customer_reviews.text: Performance is good, battery life is great. I've used this many times in the sea, never had an issue. Accidentally lost the battery cover, and the customer service is kind enough sending me a replacement, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JerryL

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend as it is so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from crowdfunding campaign. I have been really impressed so far. For the size it has amazing power. I had a sea moo one and this is so much better. Much more speed and much easier to steer. Way more agile.
customer_reviews.author: mark meyers

customer_reviews.title: Warranty work was excellent parts replaced easy to reach Sublue
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for snorkeling as well as diving on the deeper reefs with air tanks. Battery life is good when used in short bursts to get to a reef do not run continuously. Customer service is excellent I was able to reach Sublue in corona California by email and telephone the warranty efforts flawless
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun product. Battery goes a lot further if you just use in spurts to propel you towards where you want to go. Used them to snorkel in Hawaii and it was a blast. You can feel just like Aquaman flying through the water.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Wride

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My friend got one of these and let me try it and it was a blast to use! It was a smooth ride, but definitely had power. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Pester

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it diving. All it needs is a compass mounted on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ashton

product_meta.title: sublue WhiteShark Mix Underwater Scooter Dual Motors, Action Camera Compatible, Water Sports Swimming Pool Scuba Diving for Kids/Adults
feature_bullets: Simplified user-friendly design for quick and simple use. Streamlined and symmetrical design. Universal interface compatible with almost sports cameras which can be mounted to record everything under water in a most direct view. Keep the kids busy - During this special period of time, make space for social-distancing will be wise. This will be the powerful tool to keep the kids busy in the pool, fun enough to keep them stay at home.
Portable small size with large energy. The total weight of 3.5kgs makes it easy to carry without any troubles during travelling, double thrusters release 8kgf thrust to explore the world underwater.
Easy use in a safe range. Provided with a floater to achieve zero buoyancy and the propellers are designed with a safe protective net to prevent fingers from accidental injury.
Powered by a sealed and chargeable 11000hAm battery, which can run up for 30 minutes in normal usage. The working depth is rated to 40m, with maximum 3.35miles/h speed.

The battery of Sublue’s underwater product is waterproof if it is setup correctly to accord with the user manual. However, battery compartment is not watertight seal design, so water get in there is under normal circumstance. Water in the battery compartment would NOT damage the battery or the product.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
